name: cmc_bulk_scrape_coins
description: Bulk scrape detailed information for multiple cryptocurrencies from CoinMarketCap in parallel. Returns comprehensive data including price, stats, description, and tags for each coin. Use this instead of calling cmc_scrape_coin multiple times.

detailSteps.code: var h1 = document.querySelector('h1'); var nameEl = document.querySelector('[data-role="coin-name"]') || (h1 ? h1.querySelector('span') : null) || h1; var symbolEl = document.querySelector('[data-role="coin-symbol"]') || (h1 ? h1.querySelector('small') : null); var priceEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="text-cdp-price-display"]'); if (!priceEl) { var spans = document.querySelectorAll('span'); for (var si = 0; si < spans.length; si++) { var txt = spans[si].textContent.trim(); if (/^\$[\d,.]+/.test(txt) && spans[si].closest('h1, h2, [data-test]')) { priceEl = spans[si]; break; } } } var changeEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="text-cdp-price-change"]'); var descEl = null; var sections = document.querySelectorAll('section, div[id]'); for (var di = 0; di < sections.length; di++) { var heading = sections[di].querySelector('h2, h3'); if (heading && /about|description|what is/i.test(heading.textContent)) { descEl = sections[di].querySelector('p'); break; } } if (!descEl) descEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="coin-description"] p'); var bodyText = document.body.innerText; var mcMatch = bodyText.match(/Market [Cc]ap[^$]*?(\$[\d,.]+[BMTK]?)/); var volMatch = bodyText.match(/Volume \(24h\)[^$]*?(\$[\d,.]+[BMTK]?)/); var supMatch = bodyText.match(/Circulating Supply[^\d]*([\d,.]+\s*[A-Z]*)/); var rankMatch = bodyText.match(/Rank\s*#?(\d+)/i); var tagEls = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/view/"]'); var tags = []; tagEls.forEach(function(el) { var t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 50) tags.push(t); }); var officialLinks = []; var linkSection = document.querySelector('div[data-role="links"]') || document.querySelector('section'); if (linkSection) { var allLinks = linkSection.querySelectorAll('a[href^="http"]'); allLinks.forEach(function(el) { if (el.href && !el.href.includes('coinmarketcap.com')) { officialLinks.push({ text: el.textContent.trim(), url: el.href }); } }); } return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', symbol: symbolEl ? symbolEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', change_24h: changeEl ? changeEl.textContent.trim() : '', market_cap: mcMatch ? mcMatch[1] : '', volume_24h: volMatch ? volMatch[1] : '', circulating_supply: supMatch ? supMatch[1] : '', rank: rankMatch ? '#' + rankMatch[1] : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', tags: tags.slice(0, 5), links: officialLinks.slice(0, 5), url: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: coin_data
detailSteps.label: Extract full coin data
